comments.body: `lstrip()` is used to remove the first PR template comments and new lines. `strip()` has false positive because it will modify all PR description (which doesn't have comments).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +496,500 @@        title = pr["title"]

    modified_body = re.sub(re.compile(r'<!--[^>]*-->\n?', re.DOTALL), '', pr["body"]).lstrip()
    if modified_body != pr["body"]:
        print("=" * 80)
